hasDitaContent.@value: Both aceclofenac and tobramycin can increase the risk of nephrotoxicity.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Both  aceclofenac  and  tobramycin  can increase the risk of nephrotoxicity.

hasDitaContent.@value: Both aceclofenac and tolvaptan can increase the risk of hyperkalaemia (hyperkalaemia is particularly notable when ACE inhibitors or angiotensin-II receptor antagonists are given with spironolactone or eplerenone).

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Both  aceclofenac  and  tolvaptan  can increase the risk of hyperkalaemia (hyperkalaemia is particularly notable when ACE inhibitors or angiotensin-II receptor antagonists are given with spironolactone or eplerenone).

hasDitaContent.@value: Both aceclofenac and torasemide can increase the risk of hyponatraemia.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Both  aceclofenac  and  torasemide  can increase the risk of hyponatraemia.

hasDitaContent.@value: Aceclofenac causes bleeding, as can trametinib ; concurrent use might increase the risk of developing this effect. Manufacturer makes no recommendation.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Aceclofenac   causes   bleeding, as can   trametinib   ; concurrent use might increase the risk of developing this effect .  Manufacturer makes no recommendation .
